Program in HTML:

  • A bulleted list with three items.
  • Three links:
    • Google
    • Yahoo
    • Bing
  • Each list item should link to the defined search engine's homepage.
  • Each link should should always open in a blank window.
  • The list should be inside of an HTML5 tag appropriate for navigation.
exercises.solution:
• Google
  • Yahoo
  • Bing
